Posts.Content: borntocry wrote: Hello everyone, Does anyone know of a doctor in the UK willing to prescribe metronomic therapy?? Instead of the normal high-dose chemo? Or basically any doctor open to emerging or experimental treatments, like Sativex or gene testing?? Please help, it's urgent!! Thank you so much to anyone who reads this... Log in to post a reply
